name: Sudoku Cats
description:
Are you a fan of Sudoku games? 🔢 Do you like cats? 🐈 Then this game is for you! 💝 Enjoy the classic Sudoku puzzle game for kids and adults of any skill level - from novice to expert.

   

Features:

  • Simple and beautiful visuals, easy to play 🦋
  • Adorable kittens and cute cats will make you smile 🐱
  • Browse gallery of images 🖼️
  • Switch between light and dark themes 🌗
  • Auto save progress ⏳

Thanks for playing! ❤️
